model

Class CycleHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.CycleHandler

  • public final class CycleHandler
extends Object
    Singleton class that handle the cycles of an LPS framework. Only called by the static method getInstance().
    Author:
    Alexandre Camus
    See Also:
    getInstance()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private RuleSet events 
      private static CycleHandler instance 
      private CycleState myState

      Gets the only object of this singleton class.

      Sends the request to the current state to operate its behavior.

      • instance

        private static volatile CycleHandler instance

    • Constructor Detail

      • CycleHandler

        private CycleHandler()
        Constructor of the class. To be not used by itself as the class is a singleton. Use the specific method getInstance() instead.
        See Also:
        getInstance()

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static CycleHandler getInstance()
        Gets the only object of this singleton class. Use it as a static method.
        Returns:
        instance the only object of this class. If the object was not already created it will create it.

      • setState

        public void setState(CycleState NEW_STATE)
        Sets the state from which the CycleHandler will call the handlerMethod

        This allows states to terminate and send a request to the CycleHandler to go to the specified and next state.

        Parameters:
        NEW_STATE - the next step of the cycle.

      • handlerMethod

        public void handlerMethod(String NAME)
        Sends the request to the current state to operate its behavior.

        This method should be the only way to perform the action of a state. It calls the handlerMethod() of the interface CycleState which every state implements.

        Parameters:
        NAME - the name of the step. It has no use except to debug.

      • getEvents

        public RuleSet getEvents()
        Gets the events/actions that have been decided to be performed during the previous cycle.

        See a LPS documentation for more details on cycles and actions/events.

        Returns:
        an object RuleSet containing the events triggered during the last cycle.

      • setEvents

        public void setEvents(RuleSet events)
        Sets the events/actions that have been decided to be performed during the previous cycle.

        This method is basically used by a cycle during its final step to prepare the next cycle.

        See a LPS documentation for more details on cycles and actions/events.

        Parameters:
        events - the events under the form of a RuleSet object, triggered during the last cycle.

      • addEvent

        public void addEvent(Rule event)
        Adds the specified event/action to the events set.

        This method is basically used when a user adds an event.

        See a LPS documentation for more details on cycles and actions/events.

        Parameters:
        event - the event under the form of a Rule object.
